name: ip-api
label: IP-API
description: IP-API helps to get the following information for any IP address: city, region (name & code), country (name & code), continent, postal code / zip code, latitude, longitude, time zone,  utc offset, european union (EU) membership, country calling code, country capital, country tld (top-level domain), currency (name & code), area & population of the country, languages spoken, asn, organization and hostname. This connector facilitates automated operation related to ip-api.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: URL of the IP-API connector to access the connector website.
fields.tooltip: URL of the IP-API connector to access the connector website. e.g. https://ip-api.com
fields.name: server

operations.title: Execute Batch API
operations.description: Execute batch API to query multiple IP addresses in one HTTP request. This is significantly faster than submitting individual queries.

parameters.title: List of Ip Addresses
parameters.name: list_of_ip_addr
parameters.description: Required list of ip addresses eg: ['8.8.8.8', '24.48.0.1'].
parameters.tooltip: Required list of ip addresses eg: ['8.8.8.8', '24.48.0.1'].
